PageWidgetPortable.Title: Parcelas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>CLOUD_FN_PARCELAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>99</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PREVISAO <> 'S' AND A.EMABERTO = 'S' AND A.REMESSA IS NULL AND A.TEMRETENCAONABAIXA = 'N' AND A.DOCUMENTO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS B WHERE B.OPERACAOCANCELAMENTO IS NULL AND ( B.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' OR ( B.ENTRADASAIDA = 'E' AND B.TIPODEMOVIMENTO = 3 ) ) ) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
